biography: Hebri Subhaskrishna Ballal is an Indian administrator, radiologist and pro chancellor of the Manipal University and chairman of FICCI - Higher Education Committee.
aiSummary: H. S. Ballal is a dialysis expansion specialist with an H-index of 110 at Nephrology (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet. Haematology, The Lancet, BMJ case reports. Based in India.
